com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class GingerbreadUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.GingerbreadUtil

  • public class GingerbreadUtil
extends Object
    Helper methods for calling methods added in Gingerbread (2.3, API level 9).
    Author:
    lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

    • Method Detail

      • newCookieManager

        public static CookieHandler newCookieManager()
        Creates a new CookieManager instance.

      • clearCookies

        public static boolean clearCookies(CookieHandler cookieHandler)
        Clears the cookies in the given cookie handler. Cookies can only be cleared if the cookieHandler is a CookieManager with a non-null CookieStore.
        Parameters:
        cookieHandler - the cookie handler where cookies should be cleared
        Returns:
        true if cookies were cleared; false otherwise

      • newNfcAdapter
